overview: Connolly shows Ashoona at work in the Kinngait Studios, where she has been working for over 15 years, and in the surrounding streets and landscapes of Cape Dorset, a small hamlet in the Canadian territory of Nunavut. We discover what it means to the mischievous Ashoona to be an artist and how the source of her art in traditional Inuit culture is shot through with Western modernity.
title: Ghost Noise
